DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server1

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Actualiza Descripciones. */ UPDATE D_TIPOS_GALENOS_UNIDADES SET de_galeno_unidad = A.TGG_DES FROM HOST03.HOST03.DESARROLLO.ACR026 A JOIN D_TIPOS_GALENOS_UNIDADES T on A.TGG_COD = T.id_galeno_unidad
/* Actualiza nuevos ID. */ INSERT INTO D_TIPOS_GALENOS_UNIDADES (id_galeno_unidad, de_galeno_unidad, id_tipo_galeno_unidad) SELECT TGG_COD as id_galeno_unidad, TGG_DES as de_galeno_unidad, 'X' as id_tipo_galeno_unidad FROM HOST03.HOST03.DESARROLLO.ACR026 WHERE TGG_COD not in (select distinct id_galeno_unidad from D_TIPOS_GALENOS_UNIDADES)

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1
